message:
Hello, {{doc.first_name}} {{ doc.last_name}}

We are delighted to have you with Migoo.

Migoo is the one-stop destination for buying or renting high-quality construction equipment for your convenience.

You can browse through the selection of high-quality construction equipment from reputable vendors, including cranes, road machinery, construction machinery, trucks, tankers, and other necessary equipment.

Ready to leverage our platform?

Thanks & Regards,

Arjun Pachani

CEO, Migoo Equipments
name: Finally, you are here!(Lead)
subject: Finally, you are here!

message:
Hello, {{doc.supplier_name}}

Thank you for joining our growing community of customers, vendors and suppliers.

We are glad to have you onboard! It’s our goal to help you generate higher revenues on your equipment while incurring zero marketing expenses. Whether you want to list your equipment on rent or need to sell it, Migoo has got you covered.

Migoo has many features designed to help you get more done with less effort, rent & sell efficiently, and scale your business, all in one place.

And now you’re ready to receive precisely the same benefits!

Ready to boost your business?

Thanks & Regards,

Arjun Pachani

CEO, Migoo Equipments
name: Welcome aboard!(Supplier)
subject: Welcome to MIGOO Equipments!!
